titles.title: A resolution designating September 9, 2012, as "National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day".
A resolution designating September 9, 2012, as "National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Designates September 9, 2012, as National Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders Awareness Day.
Calls upon the people of the United States to observe a moment of reflection during the ninth hour of September 9, 2012, to remember that during the nine months of pregnancy a woman should not consume alcohol.
